CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 10, 1969, pg. 10 reads: "Mothers Work: Babies Win - The fourth annual Baby Contest was sponsored by the combined missionary societies of John Wesley AME Zion CHurch, recently, and the top three winners look a bit amazed at the results, because, in fact, their mothers did the running. Mrs. Thelma Lovette, left, is making the presentations.  Winners and their main supporters are, seated, left to right, Mrs. Vashti Moreland and Baby Monique; Mrs. Larue Davis and Baby Stephanie Marie and Mrs. Francine Myers and Baby Casandra.  Sponsors in the picture are, Mrs. Sarah McCaskill, standing second from left, president of the senior missionary Society; and Mrs. Lena Davis, second from right. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Thelma Lovette presenting winners of baby contest, from left; Vashti Moreland and Baby Monique; Larue Davis and Baby Stephanie Marie, and Francine Myers standing behind Baby Casandra; sponsors Sarah McCaskill and Lena Davis standing in center back row, gathered in John Wesley AME Zion Church
